attributes.action: stop the implementation of proposals to extend current pay and display hours to midnight and increase charges in the Borough of Westminster
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Westminster Council have proposed that they would like to extend pay and display hours to midnight and charge motorists £5 an hour to park on single yellow lines at these extended times. Night workers traditionally find it difficult to use public transport between midnight and 6am as it is considerably reduced during this time. Residents will also find they pay twice if they can't find a resident parking space.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
